episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_030:
Trainer Gyms are places where Pasio
Trainers can train while deepening their
bonds with one another!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_040:
There are quite a few Trainer Gyms now,
all over Pasio...
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_050: and each has its own rules and vibe!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_060: You should join a gym that suits you!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_070:
Also, we’re now giving Trainer Gyms a way
to regularly compete!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_080: I call them Pasio gym battles!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_090:
In a Pasio gym battle, members of a gym
work together to battle eight powerful
opponents!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_100:
Each gym will be compete with other
gyms and earn a ranking based on their
performance!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_110:
The eight opponents you’ll face will be
Gym Leaders from various regions who’ve
made their way to Pasio!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_120:
Many regions have a Pokémon League
challenge in which challengers collect eight
badges.
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_130:
I’ve heard this helps new Trainers grow and
evolve—and it’s what gave me this idea!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_140:
Train hard, and try to beat Pasio gym
battles’ eight Gym Leaders!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_150:
It’ll help you and your fellow gym
members grow!
episode_event_gvg_prologue/4001_1001_160:
Keep battling until your Trainer Gym reaches
the top of the rankings!
